text: Dolichocebus is an extinct New World monkey genus that lived in Argentine Patagonia (Sarmiento Formation) from about 21 to 17.5 million years ago during the Early Miocene (Colhuehuapian in the SALMA classification).Dolichocebus at Fossilworks.org The type species is D. gaimanensis. ==References== †Dolichocebus Category:Prehistoric monkeys Category:Prehistoric primate genera Category:Miocene primates of South America Category:Colhuehuapian Category:Neogene Argentina Category:Fossils of Argentina Category:Fossil taxa described in 1942
title: Dolichocebus
